channel.title: TIL on Musings and Notes
channel.description: Recent content in TIL on Musings and Notes

item.title: TIL – How to edit sketch patterns in Fusion360
item.description: While mocking up a sample holder, I wanted to go back and edit a pattern object that was embedded in a sketch. Since sketch actions don’t appear in the history scrubber (one item for the entire sketch), I couldn’t go to my default action of right-click>Edit on the object in the history scrubber.

item.title: TIL – Linking (and attaching) a local image in Lektor
item.description: While trying to post the previous item, I couldn’t get the local image to display. I tried placing the PNG file in the post folder with the contents.lr file, then linking with !
